## Pole Buoy

The purpose of the pole buoy is to help track, find, and support the
drifting recorder. The pole buoy consists of;

1.  Weighted pole
2.  Floats
3.  Bridle
4.  Radar reflector
5.  GPS mount

![*Diagram of High Flyer Pole
Buoy*](images/Screenshot%202022-10-26%20092651.png){fig-align="left"}
